name: CITY OF GREENSBORO, NORTH CAROLINA, et al., petitioners, v. BNT AD AGENCY, LLC.
name_abbreviation: City of Greensboro v. BNT Ad Agency, LLC

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
CITY OF GREENSBORO, NORTH CAROLINA, et al., petitioners,
v.
BNT AD AGENCY, LLC.
attorneys: Motion of International Municipal Lawyers Association for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
CITY OF GREENSBORO, NORTH CAROLINA, et al., petitioners,
v.
BNT AD AGENCY, LLC.
No. 17-492.
Supreme Court of the United States
Dec. 11, 2017.
Motion of International Municipal Lawyers Association for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
